author: {'steamid': '76561198090468054', 'num_games_owned': 3608, 'num_reviews': 130, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1459716715}
review:
Ho preso Love con un bundle di IndieGala comprato principalmente per il suddetto titolo. Love infatti mi aveva da un po' di tempo incuriosito per lo stile grafico minimalista (ma è dir poco) e per l'atmosfera trasognata che il trailer trasmetteva. In questo senso va detto subito che mi sono trovato abbastanza sorpreso avanzando per i 16 livelli dell'avventura principale: Love infatti è sì spesso sognatore e "leggero", ma il più delle volte risulta crudo e brutale. Con ordine. Love è un gioco di piattaforme basato sul principio del "prova e ripeti": addirittura ci sarà concesso di fissare in qualsiasi parte del livello i checkpoint, e anche se l'impressione generale del gioco è quella di un prodotto destinato a un nocciolo di giocatori "duri", il livello di difficoltà finale è abbastanza clemente. Le 100 vite che vi saranno fornite saranno presto abbondantemente sufficienti per arrivare alla fine (per me 3 mandate sono state bastevoli): a quel punto Love cerca di crearsi i suoi affezionati con una modalità speedrun con classifiche online e una snervante modalità "Yolo", che concede solo una vita per arrivare fino in fondo. In che senso dunque la brutalità? La particolarità di Love è, neanche a dirlo, il concept di fondo insito nel nome stesso. Il vero motivo trainante per cui mi sono trovato incollato al gioco nel tentativo di completarlo è la curiosità di vedere i vari modi in cui l'autore ha svolto la sua metafora visiva sull'amore. Ed è qui che la natura del gioco acquista tutto un nuovo spessore: l'amore è innanzitutto un "prova e ripeti". Interessante è notare che il primo livello è uno dei pochi a finire in un'incerta ascesa. Per il resto del gioco l'amore sarà sempre rappresentato come una caduta, che anche quando prende le sembianze di una discesa levitata sarà sempre minacciata da inquietanti chiodi. Altre ambientazioni sono ancora più esplicite nella drammaticità della rappresentazione: una segheria piena di pericoli alla fine della quale si troverà un albero troncato con un segno d'amore inciso sopra; uno scheletro di qualche mostro all'imboccatura del quale spuntano inquietanti denti (non voglio essere l'unico a aver fatto qui l'equazione: nel livello remix c'è una rappresentazione più esplicita); una fabbrica piena di rifiuti tossici con tanto di cartello che avverte della possibilità di contagio; una serie di porte aperte che il più delle volte conducono alla disfatta... e così via, solo per menzionare le immagini più potenti e univocamente interpretabili. Per il resto sono sicuro che ognuno troverà dei riferimenti personali nella simbologia di Love: il risultato finale è così d'impatto che le lodi allo sviluppatore non potrebbero essere abbastanza. Grande delusione è stato invece il comparto sonoro. Il theme del trailer è stato scelto per quella funzione non a caso: rimane il brano più ispirato e "intonato" di tutto il gioco. Per il resto non ci sono tracce che riescono a rendere abbastanza il senso di inquietudine che ho sopra cercato di descrivere: inoltre tutta la colonna sonora è impostata per ciclarsi in loop che si interrompono e ripartono con una fastidiosa soluzione di continuità. Ho accennato ai livelli remix: lo sviluppatore è ancora intento alla creazione di contenuti gratuiti per questo titolo, e non è escluso che in futuro agli otto già presenti non se ne aggiungano altri (per adesso sono tutti abbastanza "fuori metafora", tranne l'eccezione già citata). In conclusione, anche considerata l'estrema brevità per i non fanatici delle classifiche, Love è un titolo che riesce a "lasciare qualcosa": sarò felice di riscaricare questa preziosa manciata di mega se in futuro usciranno nuovi contenuti.
----
Edit 3/4/16
Aggiunto un livello extra ispirato esplicitamente al nostro idraulico preferito, assolutamente innecessario nel suo livello di sfida praticamente nullo e per essere ancor più lontano dal concept originale del titolo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198172459118', 'num_games_owned': 1531, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1655178070}
review: I LOVE this one. It allows you to be as slow as you want and even encourages caution ... But you're rewarded greatly for mastering speed running. The music and variety of challenges are well done - can't wait for further expansion or new games from tis developer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019409753', 'num_games_owned': 2097, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1424861520}
review:
To bardzo prosta i niedroga platformówka pokroju Super Meat Boy, You Have to Win the Game czy VVVVVV i innych tego rodzaju. Przy czym stylem graficznym i rozgrywką mocno przypomina tą ostatnią. 

Za zadanie mamy przejść kilkanaście prostszych i trudniejszych poziomów. Sterujemy pikselowym ludkiem w pikselowym, pełnym zagrożeń świecie. Giniemy od upadku w przepaść, od kolców, kropel, promieni, tarcz i innych zabójczych elementów. 
To co sprawia że Love warte jest polecenia to precyzyjne sterowanie czyli coś co w platformerach normą nie jest. Jeśli zginiemy to z własnej winy czy nieuwagi. Do tego dodać trzeba stawiające wyzwania levele które jednak nigdy nie są zbyt trudne i po jakimś czasie zawsze przebrniemy dalej. 
Granie urozmaici nam kilka trybów. Normalny z setką żyć do stracenia, z jednym życiem, z nielimitowanymi życiami, na czas i przeróbki paru poziomów w nowych odsłonach.

Wady? Krótka jest. W około 90 minut dotychczasowej gry zdążyłem ją przejść dwukrotnie, do tego pobiłem dodatkowy tryb z nowymi wariantami starych poziomów i sprawdziłem inne tryby. Wniosek nasuwa się sam, kontentu jest tu za mało, po prostu. 
Aż prosi się o edytor poziomów - te które dostaliśmy są niezłe ale jestem pewien że społeczność stworzyłaby małe dzieła sztuki, prosta struktura świata i wiele ciekawych jego elementów na to wskazują.
Słabe raczej jest udźwiękowanie, drugi raz grałem na głucho i wcale mi go nie brakowało.


Stawiająca wyzwania ale nie przegięta platformówka która traktuje gracza wyjątkowo uczciwie. Zginąć łatwo ale nie jest to raczej źródło frustracji (jak w SMB) ale mobilizacja do dalszych starań. Wyjątkowo polecam, fanom pikselozy a'la lata 80, zręcznościówek w stylu Meat Boya i chcącym sprawdzić się w grze której opanowanie i przejście nie zabiera wiele czasu.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198100910014', 'num_games_owned': 1611, 'num_reviews': 366, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1465750541}
review: juego de plataformas sidescroller horizontal que recuerda a un juego de la Atari de los años 80 un juego muy primitivo en esencia pero que a mi sencillamente me ha enganchado y he estado juagando,existen diversos modos de juego, modo arcade te dan 100 vidas para completar los 16 niveles de los que consta el juego,algo corto en realidad,modo facil vidas ilimitadas, y otro modo mas ademas existe un juego modificado con niveles nevos basados en los anteriores con un cierto grado de difuicultad mas elevado si cabe, en definitiva un juego de aspecto retro que no ha sabido bien envejecer con los años pero recomendable a los amantes de las plataformas con controles algo toscos, tiene compatibilidad media con controlador es decir el mando de xbox es compatible lo que ameniza un poco la jugabilidad

author: {'steamid': '76561198110859680', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1419110782}
review: Well-made, but short, platformer.  The pixel graphics are great, the platforming is tight, and the soundtrack is mesmerizing.  However, there isn't much content, and doesn't break any ground that hasn't been treaded on dozens of times before.  Best purchased on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078582252', 'num_games_owned': 1084, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1423746757}
review: The early ZX Spectrum vibe is strong with this one. It doesn't try to be flashy there are no modern machanics added nor effects to appeal to over and above the basic platforming audience. I've got to admit that I have a very soft spot, for games that pull off the style of old classics of "Bruce Lee", "ManicMiner" and countless others that have excaped me at this point. Of course Love isn't alone in Retro [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ZX_Spectrum] ZX Spectrum [/url] gaming homage. Games like "You Have To Win The Game", VVVVVV to name but two notable examples. The game Love is another beautful example of a bygone age in gaming, a simple platformer that would be prefect for speedrunning. The music is one step above what I'd expect from a £1.99 game. If I have to be negative towards Love its unlikely to change the minds that would pass on these kind of games. This is of course,  not the fault of the Developer of Love as the basic platformer is very well nailed down. To round off, all in all I'd recommend me some "Love" while it hands me a pair of rose tinted glasses once again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021010452', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1422759985}
review: A simple, yet rather fun platformer. Indeed, it is quite the short game, as I was able to complete it in one session, about a half hour long. That said though, I'm a believer in quality over quantity. I've noticed this game to be quite difficult, as I lost most of my lives in my playthrough, but it wasn't impossibly nor frustratingly difficult. Perhaps it was a lovely music or nostalgia from old-school gaming that took frustration away. I'm someone who grow up with the old games, so I think this is a nice trip back to the past, but with a few modern things added to it to give it a bit more flavor. All in all, I enjoyed my session with this game and wouldn't mind giving it another go eventually, whether on a day I'm just bored and want some fun or have a challenge at going at the game with just one life.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041143614', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1453168405}
review:
A solid platformer with what basically amounts to a built-in savestate mechanic.  Not a bad time for, what, three dollars?  Four?  Whatever.  Of course, it's very similar to VVVVVV, because as we all know, all 2-D platformers with short lives and abstract aesthetics are basically identical.  What's more, this one was originally released before Terry Cavanagh even came up with VVVVVV, so it's definitely a ripoff.  The soundtrack is nice as long as you like weird, ambient stuff.  

In conclusion, I have one question for the developer:  Why do you hate black people?

author: {'steamid': '76561198074558217', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1420082047}

author: {'steamid': '76561198089289691', 'num_games_owned': 2958, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 177, 'last_played': 1421975045}
review:
¿Qué es “Love”?, Nena no me lastimes. No me lastimes, no más ♫
Ok, eso fue horrible.

Love (a pesar de tener un título que se contrapone bastante con el sentimiento que va a florecer en el jugador) es un plataformero minimalista que se basa en superar una serie de obstáculos por tan sólo 12 (más 3 especiales) de longevidad muy corta que en tan sólo unos segundos puede ser superado. ¿Cuál es la trampa?, fácil: es uno de esos plataformero que te ponen situaciones al mejor estilo de Super Meat Boy, VVVVV o I Wanna Be The Guy. Sin embargo, y para mi sorpresa, es mucho más delicado y disfrutable.

Los 12 niveles estarán repletos de trampas, picas y pozos que van a poner a prueba toda tu habilidad de tus dedos, y teniendo en cuenta que en el modo Estándar tendremos un total de 100 vidas para perder, se crea una sensación de presión constante para el jugador. A pesar de que parece ser un número importante, morir en Love es más fácil de lo que parece, y aun peor cuando nos topamos con situaciones desprevenidas.

Habrá otros modos dónde por ejemplo nos sacan la limitación de vidas (Modo Fácil) para practicar un poco, el Speedrun (vidas infinitas) para realizar el mejor tiempo posible y el Modo YOLO aka “Sólo Vives Una Vez”, donde es autoexplicativo siendo uno de esos desafíos que podrían completarse para los AGDQ.

Desde el apartado gráfico, muy poco se puede decir ya que parece más a un juego de la segunda generación de consolas aunque lo compensa con una jugabilidad sólida cuyo resultado es optimo para hacer saltos casi milimetrados pero en ocasiones los inputs (sobre todo cuando jugamos con un gamepad) tienen que ser muy delicados, por lo que hay que tener cuidados especiales en ese asunto.

Fuera de ello es un entretenido plataformero sádico (poco) para pasar el rato o perfeccionar todos sus niveles... cosa que... bueno, no soy muy bueno.
 

[b]7/10[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198130652449', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1620967740}
review:
棒人間を操ってゴールまで導くゲームです。
値段相応のボリュームではありますが、それなりにモードも用意されていてなかなか楽しめます。
BGMもとても良くクセになるゲームです。

author: {'steamid': '76561197996457595', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1422828740}
review:
Love is a jump and run platformer at it's simplest.
Your objective is to maneuver through 12 levels with various hazards as quickly, and with as few lives as possible.

The levels are well planned, challenging but not too stressful.
The music is rather catchy and the controls are pretty solid (I'm using a 360 controller for this game).

But be aware. You will die a lot and die often.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988876886', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1420413155}
review: This deceptively simple and basic platformer is an absolute delight. After playing and beating the game in about 20 mins, I went on to playing it again, and again and again and again. The soundtrack is superb and the gives the game a feeling of depth and meaning. It's a platformer in the truest sense and it it's immensly enjoyable. I have gifted about ten copies of this game to people whom have all loved it. Buy Buy Buy, for the low asking price, it's silly not to own this this gem.

review: Just beat the standard version using a lot of checkpoints, but did it. This game is rad, worth more than the asking price for the music and pinpoint controls alone. A lot of content if you stick with it and try to raise your personal best scores. Highly recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048092359', 'num_games_owned': 1702, 'num_reviews': 235, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1420639286}
review:
It is a minimalistic platformer with pretty good controls and nice music. That is everything a good platformer needs.
 
The difficulty is good, I played a lot of other platformers and i could just barely finish the game with 10 lives left of the initial 100 lives that you get on normal mode. There are a couple of "leap of faiths" in the game but generally the game is pretty fair especially nice is that the timing puzzles (megaman blocks) have a visual clue.

The game is rather short, i finished the game in 1324 seconds that is about 22 minutes. There are some achievements and secrets but i think the replay value is rather low, there is a mode with infinite lives, and a mode with just 1 life as well as a speedrun mode but i think they all play on the same set of levels.

Maybe not a game i would buy at full price because it is so short but if you like platformers and the game is on sale go for it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031892687', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1428406895}

author: {'steamid': '76561198066403029', 'num_games_owned': 504, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1500034245}
review: Le Super Meat Boy du pauvre, mais ça ne hcnage rien vu que ce jeu reste génial ! trés court (j'ai passé 30-40 minutes à le faire en prenant mon temps) mais la durée est largement rallongée par le Love Custom qui comporte des niveau suplémentaire avec un challenge plus relevé ! et avec une B.O génialissime !

author: {'steamid': '76561198126359722', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 719, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 696, 'last_played': 1490540196}
review:
Не стоит и вовсе говорить о графике! =D
 Самое интересное - пройти все препятствия. К счастью, кое-какие сохранения тут имеются, пусть и ограниченные в своем использовании. Согласитесь, когда не получается пройти какое-то место и хочется продолжить игру потом, становится обидно на то, что это невозможно. С каждым уровнем появляется новая вполне неплохая фоновая мелодия - я бы назвала это плюсом. А оторваться от прохождения этого чьих-то рук очаровательного создания практически невозможно! 
 Насколько мне известно, в игре имеется 16 уровней, считать которые я все время забываю, увлекаясь процессом. 
 Ах, как же это напоминает игры на старых добрых приставках!

author: {'steamid': '76561198146640843', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1418496918}

author: {'steamid': '76561198018238064', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1404068856}
review:
PROS :
-3 colors at the same time on screen
-Has trading cards
-Lot of humour : "innovative respawn system" [...] "competitive scoring" [...] "abundance of features" [...] visual aesthetic ...

CONS :
-3 colors at the same time on screen
-10 minutes to finish the game, not enough time to drop a single trading card
-Actually, no humour : the game legitly try to appear as fundamentally original (a fact that is, in the end, funny I must admit)

author: {'steamid': '76561198004144177', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1453254738}
review:
Love ist nichts für den einmaligen Durchspieler, dafür sind die 12 Level einfach viel zu schnell durch.
Ich hab ca eine halbe Stunde im normalen Modus gebaucht aber ich bin auch oft gestorben :P.

Im normalen Modus hat man 100 Leben hat und wenn man intresse an einer guten Bewertung hat, man so schnell und mit so wenigen Tode wie möglich durch kommen sollte.

Dann gibt es noch ein Modus für Anfänger wo man unendliche Leben hat, ein "YOLO" Modus wo man nur 1 Leben hat und ein Speedrunner Modus.

Love hat zwar ein schlichtes Design aber es hat was eigenes und man muss den Entwicklern sehr zu gute halten, dass die Level alle gut aufgebaut sind.
Es gab nicht ein stelle die Unfair war dazu muss ich aber auch schreiben, dass Love von Schwierigkeitsgrad nicht wirklich schwer ist.
Gestorben bin ich eigenlich nur wenn ich einen Abgrund runtergesprungen bin und nicht wusste was mich unten erwartet oder wenn meine Reflexe einfach zu langsam waren.

VVVVVV emfpand ich wesentlich schwieriger und es hatte mich auch mehr zum verzweifeln gebracht.

Zu den Communitylevel aus dem Editor kann ich noch nichts sagen, aber ich hoffe das sie schwerer sind als die Standartlevel.

Der Soundtrack ist auf jedenfall hörenswert, da es für jedes Level ein eigenes Lied gibt und man merkt das man sich dort richtig Mühe gemacht hat.

Aber im Endeffekt kann man sagen, das es für den Preis ein solider Platformer ist und grade für Speedrunner schon ein Muss.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020672164', 'num_games_owned': 2076, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1420248982}

author: {'steamid': '76561198014722728', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1484512543}

author: {'steamid': '76561198005023374', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1568497436}
review:
Although Love is a short game and isn't particularly difficult to beat, there's something about the way the art style, music, and game mechanics all work together that makes it quite memorable and fun to play. Your little sprite has a breezy running motion that makes certain sections feel quite fluid, the level design is simple and attractive, and the soundtrack is alternately calming and tense. The bright colours and rows of spikes gave me VVVVVV vibes sometimes too.

As for replay value, the scoring/rank system gives you some incentive to try for more challenging playthroughs, and the YOLO and speedrunning modes offer different options as well. The ability to select individual levels to play (after you beat the game) is particularly useful for practise. 

Overall this is one of my favourite games aesthetically, and I always end up spending a little more time on it than I intend to. It's short enough that it doesn't feel like a big commitment, but has enough little achievements that it can appeal to those with a perfectionist streak too.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077651101', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 581, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1480697577}
review:
Не знаю, конечно, почему эта игра называется LOVE, но это и не важно, ведь игрушка стоит убитых нервов и времени, которые были просажены мною без раздумий. На первый взгляд игра - отстой: графика(которой толком-то и нет, лол), геймплей, звук и всё остальное - днище. Да, именно так я и думал, пока не запустил впервые. Чёрт подери, да я с первого раза на час залип, ведь она напомнила мне детство, напомнила Марио(нормальный Марио, а не МариоКарт), напомнила всю радость тех далёких деньков 2000 года. Геймплей, конечно, однообразный, но именно в этом вся винрарность игрухи. Музон оказался отличным. Ваши нервные клетки будут уничтожены под очень даже неплохую 8-ми битную музыку. 

 [h1]ИТОГ:[/h1]

 [u]Игруха 10/10, обязательный мастхев.[/u]

author: {'steamid': '76561198019205444', 'num_games_owned': 4268, 'num_reviews': 323, 'playtime_forever': 59, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1415156772}
review:
What is Love? Baby don't hurt me. Love is a simple, 2D platformer full of spikes and trampolines. You'll have 100 lives to make it through 12 'levels' of Love (easy mode has unlimited lives). When you die, you'll instantly respawn at the last checkpoint. The twist to this Love is that you'll make your own checkpoints on solid surfaces. The only controls are simple: left, right, jump and set a respawn. Its simple, but difficult all at the same time. When moving the screen left or right, I felt like the framerate would drop. Even on my 3.4 gHz Dual Core would drop from time to time, causing inaccuracies and death.

When you go into a game, are you looking for a challenge? Are you a 'speedrunner' that wants to shave seconds off your play time? Then Love might just be the game for you! For the challenge, there is a lot of precision jumping off of moving trampolines. You'll also be landing between two spikes without dying and running between drops of acid. There are a few blind jumps, but you'll quickly remember them. A lot of the time the levels have many heights. So you can fall down to a lower area and either you'll have to climb back up or die to respawn at the last checkpoint if it was above you.

The downside to the game is that it is over within 15 minutes or so. It seems like Love is less than its contemporaries like VVVVV and You Have to Beat the Game. When you complete the game, it gives you a grade a time and a score. So for score runners and speed runners, there is a reason to replay and try one of the different difficulties. While the challenge of Love is still definitely there, its all just one clear cut path with only a few moments of deviation. There is no sense of exploration. Its all just clear cut. The level designs are a mixed bag. It goes from clean levels to areas that look like line art and spiked floor deathtraps. Some levels offer sloping paths, but there's no slide mechanic. Other levels detailed with circled indents and jagged spikes.

Love will rarely switch up gameplay. There is a glimpse of a different play mechanic with a slow descent fall. But for the most part it is just moving trampoline platforms, shooting bullets in wave patterns and not much else. It feels like Love only offers spikes, bouncing and death pits. Once you are through the main game, the bonus levels offer much needed diversity to levels. Such as platforms the player can control, portals and giant static rings. So I see the developer is still trying to add more content. All the bonus levels play out pretty quickly.

It just seems like too quick of a game without enough diversity until the bonus levels. Even then, the gameplay is always the same and Love does nothing to add features beyond different death traps.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079348407', 'num_games_owned': 134, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1478406297}
review:
OVERVIEW: Love is a 16-bit 2d platformer in which you navigate through 12 unique levels. The interesting part of this game is that you have the option to set a respawn point whenever you want, but at the cost of a lower final score if you constantly set spawns. The game boasts several different modes including the standard mode, in which you must finish the game with 100 lives, and the speedrun mode, where you must finish the game as fast as possible.

PROS:
- An abundance in variety of obstacles between the levels, no 2 levels feel the same
- Difficult at times, yet not unfair
- Very fluent controls
- Majority of the levels have a smooth soundtrack
- Very reasonable price
- Features software which allows you to create your own levels

CONS:
- Not choc-a-bloc with content
- First time players might lose patience with some of the later levels
- Can get boring after long sessions 

VERDICT:
Love pretty much flawlessly does what it set out to do, the solid platforming combined with the chill soundtrack makes for a cheap, fun game which serves a great way to kill 15-30 minutes a day.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060597598', 'num_games_owned': 3293, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1842, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1566168376}
review:
I haven't had this much fun with a platformer since VVVVVV - and I'd definitely recommend it for fans of the aforementioned game. This is fairly straightforward, and probably won't give you endless hours of gameplay unless you're a completionist, but I had an unsuccessful go at Standard difficulty, then played Easy (unlimited lives), then straight back to Standard, and am now eyeing up the achievements to see which are within my capability. It's a fun game, of about the perfect length for its price and gameplay style. It does have to be played in one sitting, but if even I can manage that in under half an hour (and I am not good at computer games) then that should be fine for most players, and it has that engagingly moreish level of frustration which keeps you playing without ever crossing the line into painful.

Another strength of the game is the way it introduces concepts and approaches to you, in particular the bouncing platforms, and then increases the difficulty over subsequent levels. It is also well ramped up difficulty-wise, so that while I can get through the first level without dying, the penultimate one will easily eat a quarter of my total lives.

For the hardcore there are other modes - both Speedrun and YOLO (which both kind of do what they say on the tin) - as well as scores at the end of the run to attempt to improve, and achievements corresponding to each of these; probably beyond what I personally will aim for due to sheer difficulty, but a good addition for those who want to get more playtime out of this game or just those masochists who like a bit more of a challenge.

I can't comment on the music, as I haven't been able to have my volume on for unrelated reasons, but the art style also lends itself to the game with its simplicity and retro aesthetic. That said, I'm not sure I'd advise it for anyone with epilepsy as there is one section which does appear to almost flash at you as you descend, and I'm not sure whether that could cause problems.

Overall, great fun, eminently moreish and a perfectly positioned short, affordable platformer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043911200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1460901059}
review:
なんか某人間が動き回ったり戦ったりする昔のFlash（小小作品シリーズだっけ？）に出てきそうなアスレチックをひたすらこなしていく。例えるのであればVVVVVとかI wannaをもっとシンプルにした感じ。
内容量はまあまあで、むしろ全ステージこなした後のTAが本番っぽい
BGMが退廃的というかレトロチックというか、ゆめにっきで流れてそうなこれまたなんとも素晴らしい雰囲気。
こういう系大好きだけど初見で残機4/100でクリア、ランクはD+だったからちょっと難しめに感じた。落ち着いてやらないとドツボにはまる感じも良い。
特に雰囲気作りが丁寧で愛に満ち溢れているなぁと思いました

author: {'steamid': '76561198118752633', 'num_games_owned': 2507, 'num_reviews': 169, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1413781418}
review:
小而精的平台跳跃游戏 
作为一款像素类游戏，操作上的手感完全能够满足你的各种精细的操作要求。
难度上也并非如I WANNA一般困难。作为一个新手，基本上可以一次在Easy难度通关。而仅限100生命的Normal难度有一定的挑战难度，担忧不会太过艰难。预计在练习上四五次后就可以达成。对于硬核玩家。也有一命模式与竞速模式供你挑战。
游戏的配乐可以说是一大亮点，每个关卡的BGM舒适悦耳。有FC游戏配乐的风格，但是更加轻柔，没有电子配乐的刺耳感。难怪论坛里一大票求OST下载的呼声。
关卡的难度设计非常Nice,难度变化能够超越玩家的期望。既能满足玩家的挑战欲望，又不会太过艰难带给玩家挫败感。
像素风格的画面简约而不简单，任务的跑动、跳跃形象可触。甚至死亡动画也有三四个不同版本。
唯一的遗憾是不能存档。对于一个新手来说，完成一次挑战所需要的近乎四十分钟还是比较长的一段时间。
我的评分：7.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198083532342', 'num_games_owned': 132, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1416461822}
review:
Love games like this.
My only issues with this game is:
1. Cannot change keys. Using 'A' or 'Z' to jump is a little odd. I'd rather it be the up arrow key.
2. The 4 Windowed options are all the same size. So either very small window, or full screen mode. Also cannot change resolution.

Aside from those two things, this game would be amazing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044456581', 'num_games_owned': 353, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1415278351}
review:
Честно говоря, не могу порекомендовать эту игру даже по скидке. За 26 рублей лучше купить вкусную мороженку - она доставит больше удовольствия.
По сути, это очень короткий (минут на 30) платформер. Графика никакая - не потому, что пиксельная, а потому, что не вызывает ни интереса ни ассоциаций с чем-либо. Музыка... Ну по крайней мере не противная, хотя никакого желания сохранить её в плейлисте она никак не вызывает. Сюжета нет, каких-то дополнительных плюшек я за эти полчаса (единственное прохождение) не заметил. Да и проходить её неинтересно: просто бежишь от начала уровня к концу уровня, периодически подтаскивая к себе точку возрождения и умирая на всяких опастностях.

Если хочется платформера, возьмите лучше что-нибудь типа VVVVVV. Или Electronic Super Joy. Ну или Super Meat Boy в конце концов. А это... Просто поделка и не более того.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007746696', 'num_games_owned': 560, 'num_reviews': 168, 'playtime_forever': 268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1614869519}
review:
THE GOOD:
Retro Graphics
Good controls
Enjoyable Gameplay
Multiple Modes
Minimalist platformer

THE BAD:
Relatively short, even with other modes
Very simple graphics--maybe too simple for you
Minor, non-gamebreaking glitches

The game Love is really entertaining and I like it based on my bias toward simple and fun platformers.  It is worth a small price for its shortness, but you will enjoy every part of it.  It supports gamepads, has a speedrun mode, and a one life mode.  The standard mode you are graded on gives you 100 lives and grades by how many lives and respawn points you use through the 15 or so levels.  

The main glitch is when accessing menus too quickly or when returning to a mode after being in another--it is always better to exit the game to switch modes because the glitch will make the graphics awkwardly flicker.  This never happens sporadically so it is more of a minor annoyance than a gamebreaker. 

All in all it is a nice and short minimalist platformer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119909362', 'num_games_owned': 852, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1413624659}
review:
首先感谢送我游戏的DeL壕。

说实话拿到游戏之后看了一眼商店页面的视频，我回忆起了一度被《超级肉肉哥》、《喵里奥》支配的恐惧。但是通关之后发现官方介绍的那一句“Love is a minimalist platforming game with a retro aesthetic and a focus on a challenging but not unfair difficulty”所言不虚。
游戏画面和音乐风格在商店页面的视频里已有展示，所见如所得。画面简陋，BGM我觉得挺好听的。游戏难度也不高，我这种手残都能通关……大触也可以挑战speedrun和一命通关。
流程很短，剧情表述不明以至于你可以认为没有剧情。

总之这游戏除了BGM我没有get到其他的point，所谓的LOVE我也我也只是感受到了送我游戏的壕的LOVE。

author: {'steamid': '76561198068868075', 'num_games_owned': 1962, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1414146746}
review:
If Super Meat Boy was a techno demo.

Если бы Super Meat Boy был техно демкой.
Ощущения примерно левеле на 5ом были напоминающими те самые из 2010го
Первые минут 10, правда, пытался почувствовать персонажа, ибо с этим тут поначалу проблемы, но в целом, свой ценник игра окупает без остатка.
И, что интересно, чем дальше, тем интереснее построение уровней и саундтрек.
И из минусов, так же могу отметить крайне неудачные геймдизайнерские решения, вроде прыга в темноту, что является не честным по отношению к играющему, ибо он не может расчитать куда ему прыгнуть и не видит цели, а просто иногда прыгает наугад, что для платформеров непозволительная огрешность со стороны разработчиков. Тем более, что тут не как в том же Мит Бое или VVVVVV, где количество попыток пройти уровень ограничивается только количеством твоих нервных клеток, то здесь же в нормал моде даётся 100 жизней и убивать даже одну из них, потому что разработчик оказался непредусмотрителен, как-то жалко.
Но это терпимо и не то чтобы полностью мешает получить то самое мазахистское удовольствие от игры.
А потому рекомендую

Так бы выглядела технодемка Super Meat Boy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040884867', 'num_games_owned': 2433, 'num_reviews': 901, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1413402350}
review:
I have had my eye on this game for a while. Finally picked it up for under a buck, and I gotta say I am quite dissapointed for even that low of a price. This is something I would expect to be a free flash game. It tries hard. I mean the effort is there, but because it is soooo directly comparable to many other games, it falls seriously short. I mean the soundtrack is ok in places, but overall meh. The platforming is easy, and very standard. This game brings *nothing* new to the genre. I just wish it weren't so flippin' similiar to VVVVVV (which is pure art). 

I also question the odd developement decision to make the suicide one button, and the respawn set two. Did anyone really need a suicide button? I never used it, but I certain reset my spawn every 10 feet which was made laborious by having to push two buttons instead of one. 

I also wonder if this game could benefit from not giving the player a set number of lives, but a set number of times they can reset their spawn.

I would stay away from this one for all of the reasons above, plus its under an hour of gameplay from start to finish.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016437391', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1430346452}
review:
"Love" is a fine platformer with flashes of real greatness.

My biggest complaint is with the level design. Most of the levels are fairly by-the-numbers explorations of a single mechanic, using mostly horizontal platforms. It's a shame, because when it deviates from this formula the game comes into its own. In particular, the level "Belly of the Beast" (pictured on one of the trading cards) is fantastic, and shows how rewarding platforming can be when exploring the level is its own reward. If the rest of the game had been up to that standard, I would recommend it unreservedly. 

Still, it's a fun experience, with responsive controls and a good soundtrack.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048872869', 'num_games_owned': 566, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1705639395}
review: A brief but fun little bite sized platformer. A classic game with some really awesome tunes, the new features added in the Steam version alone are worth buying this once free game. Totally give it a spin if want something light to playthrough.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060718525', 'num_games_owned': 335, 'num_reviews': 208, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1395603680}
review:
Я покупал эту игру за копейки, начнём с этого. Перейдём сразу к сравнению, где всё подробно опишу.

Плюсы, их мало, но есть:
1) Незнаю, что именно заставляет это делать, но что-то. Есть какой-то интерес прохождения игры, наверное музыкально сопровождение каждой карты.
2) Режимы. Хоть эта игра и пиксельная, в ней есть 4 режима: без огранечения времени и смертей; без огранечения смертей, но подсчётом времени; ограничение смертей и подсчёт времени; ограничение всего на 1 смерить с подсчётом времени. Время нигде не ограничено. Первые два режима не отличаются почти ничем, вторые два заставляют не умирать.

На этом плюсы игры заканчиваются. Теперь к минусам:
1) Графика. Как я говорил ранее - пиксельная игра.
2) Геймплей. Для прохождения игры понадобится всего 5 кнопок: прыжок, влево, вправо, сохр. точки возраждения, взраждение. Прохожим уровни и идём на следующий.
3) Время прохож дения. Первый раз я игру проходил окло 30 мин. Сейчас мне хватает мин 5-10 чтобы пройти её полностью. Она очень короткая.
4) Нет никакого сюжета. Вот Вы нажали старт и поехали!

Эта игра на любителя.  Я покупал со скидкой, поэтому много не потерял.  (вроде 29 руб.) :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198128759021', 'num_games_owned': 2583, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1434574195}
review:
唯一能体现制作者对玩家Love的地方是按X键能随便放复活点……由于这个设定的存在，游戏的反人类度倒还好，Easy无限命通关还是比较简单的，当然刷成就就是另外一回事了。

游戏手感偏硬，流程略短，亮点不多。对同类游戏感兴趣的话倒更推荐免费游戏： [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/286100/]You Have To Win the Game[/url]。

作为一个喜+1游戏其名字充满了浓浓的爱♂意，而且掉卡，值得推荐 233

author: {'steamid': '76561197996550048', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1412769424}
review:
Love's got some pretty chill beats and the aesthetic is nice. there are now 15 levels to complete on multiple modes; most of them have interesting set pieces, even if the game essentially has no story. the player-created checkpoint system is a neat gimmick that tallies into your final score, and apparently there's a level creator too but i never tried it. 

however, for being such a short, simple game the core platforming mechanics don't feel as smooth as they could be; maybe i'm just bad though. i'd say this game is worth a dollar at best, but not the regular asking price of three, and even then there's really not enough content in the game to be truly excited about. might be a bit more interesting if you're into speedrunning.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027212244', 'num_games_owned': 673, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1701482523}
review:
Love is quite a good game. I don't know why it's named love, but I'm not someone who analyzes names...

Anyway, love is a platformer that is difficult. It is decently difficult - not ridiculous and not super challenging. This game is more for those who like to try to speed-run and like beating the same levels better and better. There's only 15 short levels, and within an hour, I was able to speed-run this game with less than 15 minutes on the counter.

If you like replaying VVVVVV and Super Meat Boy to try to do better than average to really good, then you'll LOVE this game. Otherwise, really think about buying this. Like I said, this game is for those who like speed-running.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039863685', 'num_games_owned': 1423, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1414442629}
review:
Few unfair situations and abysmal visuals, but what we have is a nice, tight platformer for casual play, when you have a few spare minutes (whole game can be finished in about 10 minutes, when you learn the levels, but because of time attack, it does have some replay value).
Don't expect too much, and you will like it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061624585', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1411825793}
review:
I'm neutral for this game.. I played it for 20-30 minutes and like other people who skipped tutorial, I don't know the X button would change the teleport. I thought this game was unforgiving, but I think I'm wrong.. you just need timing and good memory to remember all the obstacle (which means you need many trials and errors).
I can't say I love it, because the previous game I played was vvvvvv (about 2 hrs before playing this game and I love it) and it's .. totally different scale, this game' level design feels just "normal" , "classic" and "frustating" (not challenging) and I don't see any stories and I don't know the setting of this game. I hope I'm wrong, let see a bit more.. however, I would recommend this game for people who love retro platformer which require skills and good memory

author: {'steamid': '76561198026575104', 'num_games_owned': 2072, 'num_reviews': 428, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1426876563}
review:
This platformer has simple (retro) graphics, simple music....and it is simply difficult. ^^
This game offers you all in the first 15 minutes and guides you through 3 stages.
I stage (0-5 min) : WTF is this and WTF is going on here?
II stage (5-10 min) : crying, screaming, shouting, cursing yourself and the game and the way you lose lives
III stage (15+ min) : you reach almost zen-like peace with your mind and soul and you don't feel any anger anymore (probably as side effect of raging in second stage).
:)

author: {'steamid': '76561198102562894', 'num_games_owned': 1777, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1533225604}
review:
한번 맞으면 죽는 게임 진짜 싫어하는데 이 게임도 그 부류입니다.
물론 게임 도중 퀵세이브 기능을 통해 빡침을 최소화할 수 있지만,
이 퀵세이브 기능 때문에 오히려 도전 욕구를 깎아먹는다고나 할까요.
그러면서 다시 플레이해볼 가치는 그닥 없는 그런 게임..
앉은자리에서 하기에는 플레이타임 한 시간 채우기도 버거운 게임입니다.
한 시간이 두세 시간처럼 길게 느껴지는 게임이었습니다.
여러모로 제값을 못 하는 게임이므로 비추천합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063888979', 'num_games_owned': 885, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1418991363}
review:
플레이시간 1시간 / 도전과제 11%

지금까지 한 게임중에 플레이타임이 가장 짧은 게임이네요.
뭐 여러가지 모드가 있긴 하지만 다 해볼가치도 없네요..;;
플레이하면서 계속 느낌점은 vvvvvv와 너무나도 비슷한 느낌을 받았습니다.
하지만 vvvvvv는 여러가지 기구들과 중력반전 시스템으로 풀어나아가는것이 재미인데 이 게임은 그런것들도 너무 적네요.
제 리뷰 처음으로 비추천을 남깁니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088883421', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1523261154}

author: {'steamid': '76561198096556700', 'num_games_owned': 404, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1629686962}
review:
Love is an orthodoxed 2D platformer which strives in challenging gameplay and minimalistic graphics. You play a character which is a few blocks tall and wide, and to complete the game, you must brave this character through the many levels in which this game has to offer.

All of the levels in Love can vary in terms of difficulty, ranging from a few blocks to jump over, to dissapearing platforms which stay on the level for only a few seconds. Anyone who can complete the game (which, by the way doesn't take that long) has achieved something.

There is a variation of game-modes in which you can choose from, from "Easy Mode", to "YOLO Mode" this game can keep you busy for hours. No matter what mode or difficulty you play this game on, Love never ceases to grasp & hold the unique atmosphere of the game. Which is why I like it.

How this game manages to do this is the distinctable level design and the soundtrack, which is absolutely fantastic.

If you enjoy platforming games, or are looking for some neat singleplayer games to keep you from your boredom, take a look at Love.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040677974', 'num_games_owned': 12716, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1476764113}

author: {'steamid': '76561198062456300', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 219, 'last_played': 1408097369}
review:
Pixelacos gordos, plataformas con diseño sencillo, música electrónica y mucha precisión. Juego simple pero juarcor en el que vas mejorando a base de la repetición, la memoria mental y muscular, la paciencia... ay la paciencia...

Aunque el objetivo general es correr mucho y morir poco, hay varios modos que se ajustan más a una idea u otra. Si eres de los que desayunan huevos crudos, prueba el modo "una vida"... y muere (MUERE!!!)

A pesar de ser la cosa más simple del universo, muy rollo "juego en basic" del spectrum (aunque infinitamente más rápido), es adictivo a más no poder. Y sólo por eso, ya merece un HAMOR

author: {'steamid': '76561197977323553', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1407818065}
review:
Some background, I originally planned to purchase this on my OUYA, and I played the demo that was available there for a long time. Loved it, and bought it the moment it became "available". Only problem was the game wasn't supposed to be available for purchase. (They basically took my money with no deliverable). I contacted the Dev (Fred) and he was more than happy to give me support on the issue. Fast forward two months and it turns out OUYA locked his listing (security key issues). Being the nice guy he is, Fred let me transfer my purchase to steam. All in all the dev is a real good dude.

(TL;DR = Great developer support for all of his customers reguardless of platform)

Now onto the actual game. Its a kick ass platformer. I love the art style and I think that it combines the right amount of difficulty with extremely tight and accurate controls. I havn't enjoyed a TANP as much as LOVE since Super Meat Boy. If you're into this style of game, then I can't reccomend this game enough. Not only are you getting a great game, you're also helping a great person.

author: {'steamid': '76561198139969485', 'num_games_owned': 913, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1407572972}
review:
虽然不知道为什么，总之先呵呵一声~呵呵~

个人感觉无论从虐人指数，脑内砸机次数，血压飙升数值，操作流畅度，关卡设计鬼畜度等方面都完爆super meat boy（勿喷~）
美工换包，增加存档功能可能会大卖~

LOVE,如果你爱你的基友，请送他这个游戏~我相信，你们会更相亲相爱的~~
虽然还是不知道为什么，总之再呵呵一声~
呵呵~！

LOVE并不只是一个+1的小游戏，它真的很好~虐~。

author: {'steamid': '76561198003910945', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 382, 'last_played': 1455799495}
review:
Love is such a fantastic game. 

It's a platformer that feels different. The graphics are simple but fit perfectly with this game. It makes it even more addictive. 

There are many endurance games that you give up on within minutes because it just doesn't seem worse all the annoyance. This isn't one of those games. This is one of those games that you'll 'give it one more go' over and over until you get past it.

My only suggestion for the game, would be making a way to share levels made in the level editor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098461475', 'num_games_owned': 278, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 2231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1704, 'last_played': 1564582936}
review:
[ANALISIS INICIAL]
Desde el punto de vista de un indie gamer lo unico que tengo que decir es que LOVE cumple con todas las espectativas que presenta tanto en el trailer como en las capturas. Puedes hechar horas facilmente intentando superar los complicados y enrevesados niveles de este gran juego o retándote a ti mismo a superar el complejo YOLO Mode en el que solo dispones de una única vida. O incluso intentando completar los logros que Steam ofrece con este juego.
Sin duda, totalmente recomendable.

[ANALISIS TRAS LA ÚLTIMA ACTUALIZACIÓN]
A ver, sobre esto habrá diversas opiniones ya que el hecho de que incluyan mas niveles en el juego siempre es algo interesante y que suele llevar a mas y mas horas de entretenimiento, Sin embargo, en mi mas sincera opinión, pienso que esto es demasiado. 
Cuando juegas a LOVE te acabas acostumbrando a un nivel de dificultad alto, pero sin excederse (no estamos hablando de La Mulana ni nada por el estilo). Sin embargo, estos 4 nuevos niveles me parecen muy inadecuados no por su dificultad, (sin duda mayor al resto del juego) sinó porque el cambio que se produce entre el nivel 12 y el 13 me parece demasiado atroz refiriendonos a la dificultad de los mismos, por lo tanto no puedo aceptar facilmente estos niveles. Igualmente, sigue siendo cuestión de jugar y jugar hasta dominarlos, pero igualmente mantengo mi opinión.
Respecto a los nuevos niveles del "remix" no tengo nada que decir ya que me han gustado mucho, Buena dificultad y bastante sorprendentes (aun siendo muchos de ellos muy parecidos a los del LOVE original)
NOTA: Según pasa el tiempo obviamente te acostumbras pero el cambio brusco se nota.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067154001', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1419821642}
review:
英語非対応ですが「ジャンプ」「自殺」「リスポーン地点設置」
の3アクションさえ分かれば問題ナシです。


ジャンプでマップを進んだり跳ねる床を利用して進んだりといたって普通の横スクロールアクションゲームです。

自分で好きな場所にリスポーン地点を設置出来て、なおかつ自殺ボタンがついているので快適にプレー出来ます。
（自殺ボタンは下の地形に落ちてしまった時などに大変嬉しい）

床の狭さ、ジャンプの高さ、トラップの当たり判定などが判定結構シビアなので結構死にます。


リスポーン地点が自由に設定出来る、逆戻りの時に自殺出来る、BGMやデザインが可愛い、トレカがある
この値段ならいいかなって感じ


全然どうでもいいけどキー間違えて連打してたらリスポーン地点を変な所に作ってしまい復活する度死ぬという感じで詰みましたｗ

author: {'steamid': '76561198102275691', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1428865842}
{'steamid': '76561197993255188', 'num_games_owned': 700, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1413600197}
review:
This game is platforming at its most basic.  The controls are exactly what they need to be for making almost but not quite pixel-perfect jumps, and the graphics, while hardly the best, offer a few well-designed visual backgrounds and are always functional enough to let you recognize what will kill you and what dangers are ahead.  The levels are well designed with just enough trickiness to offer potential traps but that the Single Life mode seems (at least to me) very much possible, some day, with enough practice.  And the levels are also fun, which I think is the most important part.  They are all very memorable in at least one way, and offer a variety of challenges.  They are good enough that I feel it is worth playing through the speedrun mode, and playing multiple rounds to attempt to reach A++ scores.

Basically, it is a well-crafted challenge platformer that is beatable by probably most people but also offers enough challenges that people will want to come back to it repeatedly, and is short enough that a full game is not a huge time sink and failing does not prohibit you from coming back and playing again because you felt like you spent too much time on it.  I would rank it better than average, and well worth the very low price of entry.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048480941', 'num_games_owned': 2676, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1659210491}

author: {'steamid': '76561198061249750', 'num_games_owned': 1173, 'num_reviews': 168, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1473996254}
review:
Edit: Went through some of the new levels and they all radiate the same charm as the originals. All the new modes well complement it, and I dare say make them game even more worth the pittance of an asking price. Don't miss out on this hidden gem.

Love is a wonderful platformer that never fails to surprise, even after multiple playthroughs. While very short, (taking a little under an hour to play through your first time), the ability to create your own levels and the challenges they have presented throughout, with most levels hiding cool little secrets, Love keeps you occupied and engaged. While the game is technically done, the makers are consistently adding new stuff and updating quite frequently, so there will always be something to come back to.

Also, the soundtrack is absolutely gorgeous. Definitely worth checking out for the insanely low price.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971339745', 'num_games_owned': 13716, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1392892376}
review:
http://www.dresinos.com/2014/02/love-completado.html

    Plataformas 2D que como se puede ver a simple vista tiene un estilo retro. Es un juego muy simple, además de movernos y saltar tenemos para dejar una especie de checkpoint donde resucitaremos cuando nos maten. No hay ningún enemigo, consiste solo en no caer en las trampas.

    El juego es cortísimo, aunque muy rejugable. Tiene tres niveles de dificultad, fácil donde tenemos vidas ilimitadas, normal donde contamos con 99 vidas para pasarnos el juego (este modo es el que he jugado y en solo 15 minutos lo he acabado el juego) y difícil donde solo tenemos una vida para pasarnos el juego. Aunque dure poco, conseguir todos los logros puede llevar mucho tiempo, sobretodo porque uno es pasárselo en el modo difícil, y dominar el juego para pasárselo sin morir puede llevar mucho tiempo. Además cuenta con un editor de niveles.

Mi Puntuación del juego seria de 7,5 sobre 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008522548', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 174, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1406079875}
review:
Cool Rage Platformer. This is just like VVVVVVV but it has 4 modes which sets it apart. there is unlimited lives mode . Standard mode : Which is 100 lives . YOLO mode , and speed run mode. the platforming doesnt seem as hard as vvvvvvv because you are not constantly fliping and trying to reorient yourself but it is hard enough. You get repawners and each toime you use a respawner you lose points towards your final score. So if you are a high score perfectionist you should love this.

Its a fun game but with how cheaply it looks like it was made I wouldnt spend more than 5 bucks on it. and thats if you love rage platformers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090280779', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1408398399}
review:
刚刚打通了普通难度，心好累。
如果你是为了这个叫做LOVE的徽章来的，那就随便你了。如果不是，而且你不是抖M，请不要砰这款游戏。我玩了两次，第一次NORMAL，死在了第六面，第二次EASY无限命……总算过了。这游戏就是给散人什么的玩的……
虽然游戏名叫做LOVE，实际上没有什么实质的剧情，游戏内基本没有任何演出，也没有明说什么设定。游戏努力地用像素来表达我们的主角穿越了工业区什么的到达了一只龙的体内，然后我甚至不知道主角是怎么打败龙的……

[table]
    [tr]
        [th][b]5/10[/b][/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]+ 说得过去的难度[/td]
    [/tr]

        [td]+ 人性化的复活点系统[/td]

[/table]

review:
Viem, tý čo čítate recenzie, a  vidíte doporučenia na túto "starú", nemodernú, zaostalú hru, tak  sa možno čudujete :) či sme normálny, tý ktorý dávame palec hore.Ale môžem  povedať že sme :) Mňa táto hra keď som ju dostal (Náhodný Steam Key) veľmi neočarila a skoro som nad tým zaplakal, že čo som to vlastne dostal :), ale už po niekolkých minútach hrania ma začala baviť a po odohraní celej hry môžem s kľudom povedať že je to príjemna skákačka :) (je pravda že niekedy vás vie naštvať :) ale ktorá hra nie ? ). A môžem ju vrelo odporučiť :) 

Hodnotenie: 80/100

author: {'steamid': '76561198043609914', 'num_games_owned': 3556, 'num_reviews': 834, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1403783933}
review: Love is a platforming game in the style of atari 2600 games but will you want to play through this game ? In the game theres no story you bassicly go through stages and thats it but is that bad ? Love is probably one of the best platformers on steam without a doubt. The game is kinda on the short side but thats not bad and this game is actually quite fun and i would suggest you to play through it at least once. Now for the good things. The game is pretty fun but at the same time challenging. The game has an amazing soundtrack which is great to hear once you jump throught the game. Graphics looks amazing for a pixel like game. Now for the bad. The game is incredibly short you can pretty much finish the game in half an hour. Some minor bugs like getting stuck in the enviroments. But thats pretty much it. Overall this game is incredibly fun and i would suggest all of you to play Love. I give Love a 7.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198110324282', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1404225615}

author: {'steamid': '76561197982180511', 'num_games_owned': 579, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1446792637}
review: Love is an amazing run and jump platformer. Replay is high, if only for the achievements and for speedrun bragging rights. Great soundtrack that doesn't grate even after the dozenth listen and wonderful pixel-landscapes make a very enjoyable experience!

author: {'steamid': '76561198042254599', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1538278688}
review: A neat little precision platformer made for those who like to punish themselves.  There's not much to it, like the others have said, and that's by design.  You are the white pixel dude, and the point is to get to the end of the level without dying, or as few times as possible.  The music is pretty cool, the controls are nice and tight (there's no way to do a game like this otherwise), and the game is short...it's a downside if you're looking for a bunch of content, but if you enjoy speedrunning, and like the idea of trying a time or two in between putting your kids down for a nap (a huge plus in my book), you'll like this.  It encourages multiple playthroughs, and did I mention the soundtrack?  Besides, it's three bucks.  I've paid just as much for mobile games that weren't half as enjoyable and that got touched twice.  Give this a go!

author: {'steamid': '76561198005779315', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1408000093}

author: {'steamid': '76561198025631096', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1404340822}
review: Love is pain. Love is suffering. Love is a minimalist platformer that, just like VVVVVV, puts your reflexes to the test in a pixelated world of eye-straining wonder. The game itself is challenging, but fair, with precise controls and an amazing soundtrack. Any mistakes you make will be your own... and that is, perhaps, the most frustrating part. If you don't mind the visuals, give Love a chance, you won't be disappointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992888227', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1541132943}
review:
Fantastic for a few hours of fun. Between the great electro music tailored to each level, minimalist graphics, intuitive controls, and an innovative checkpoint system, the game is a real bargain. 

Love ramps up the difficulty on some levels just enough to satisfy my Super Mario World Special World nostalgia craving. I say buy it and try it when you want something to occupy your mind for an hour or two.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080208697', 'num_games_owned': 388, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1587325133}
review: Fun game in the vein of "Super Meat Boy" or "The Impossible Game", very challenging and unforgiving, but worth the effort. The main game is relatively short, but the achievements and other game modes add to the replayability.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964081702', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1445556344}
review: I love platforming games, and this one has such charm.  I think I keep replaying it to listen to the music as much as get through it.  It's a short game by all means, but that seems to be the point.  It's a brief, mesmerizing platforming experience.  Definitely pick up this awesome little game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026488684', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1424207572}
review: This is the first game I have reviewed on steam.  If you like platforming, GET IT NOW!  I was amazed at how immersive this game is, something I didn't expect with the minimalistic graphics.  The levels are so cool to look at and while it is a tough platformer, it is 100% fair.  If you die it was your fault, not a glitch or something.  I recommend an xbox (or other computer) controller, it really makes this game shine.  I got this on a steam summer sale, and I almost feel guilty for it not costing more money, that's how good this is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020397289', 'num_games_owned': 451, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 562, 'last_played': 1500167961}
review: The creator of this game did a truly wonderful job making a pixel death simulator. There are a variety of noises that play when your boxy hero bites the dust, and get prepared to hear them over and over again! I'm one of those people that has 300~ steam games and never plays through them, but I actually went all the way through the end of this one. GREAT platformer, especially for the price!

author: {'steamid': '76561198001747409', 'num_games_owned': 2362, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 733, 'last_played': 1432561349}
review:
Un jeu destiné pour les passionnés de jeux de plateforme rétro.

Le jeu a une courte durée de vie si on ne fait que le mode normal, mais sa durée de vie s'étend au delà de cela avec son mode Speedrun qui vous permet de rentrer dans le leaderboard mondial intégré à Steam.
De plus, des nouveaux niveaux (3) ont été intégrés par le créateur, ces 3 niveaux vont être mis en place dans le mode speedrun dans peu de temps et les leaderboards seront reinitialisés, une bonne occasion pour sauter sur ce jeu qui ne vaut même pas 3 € et qui, en promo, ne demande qu'à etre acheté et à être mis entre de bonnes mains.

En clair, un bon jeu de plateforme bien inspiré, avec du speedrun à gogo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037197299', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 1107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 487, 'last_played': 1439284877}
review: Simple, short but fun platformer game with a neat and funny looking pixelated character, variety of music gives the game good atmosphere. Recommended for hardcore gamers that want to have more from the game in Yolo or Speedrun mode. Game is without a story but that makes it special to create/imagine your own story for yourself while playing. You can make your own levels with paint or photoshop, i`m curious to try this but its not neccesary to have alot more levels since i like minimalistic games, sometimes its better having less than abundance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101021219', 'num_games_owned': 122, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1452014270}
review: Ein sehr oldschool-mäßiges Spiel, welches einfach gestaltet ist und geringe Anforderung hat. Es bietet durch sein scheinbar endloses Spiel ein unheimlich fesselndes Spielerlebnis! Da man ja scheinbar nie ein Ziel erreicht, versucht man es immer weiter, wie Minecraft oder vergleichbare endlos Spiele! LOVE wird von den Entwicklern auch immer weiter entwickelt, wodurch die Level immer weiter wachsen und das Spielerlebnis immer länger wird! LOVE ist ein Spiel für zwischendurch, welches man schnell mal spielen kann, wenn man mal nicht so viel Zeit zur Verfügung hat!

author: {'steamid': '76561198020028982', 'num_games_owned': 2316, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 484, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 410, 'last_played': 1705823432}
review: LOVE is 100%, one of the absolute best platformers I have ever played in my life. Easy to get through, hard to master, can be beat in less than 10 minutes once you work out a method. Good post-release support, easy level editor. Fantastic developer and a fantastic game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037253388', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1700966649}
review:
Love, what do I?
Fred Wood's Love had me wondering if it posed a moral or meaning to itself, but there is nothing.You are a small person that can run and jump. Simple? Yes. Confusing story? Indeed. In fact, there is no story. Your hasty legs speed you around world of mystery. Through a blood-red land with giant ornate blades flying through, to an ancient, rotting husk of a prehistoric creature. As you scream at the inescapeable deaths of the elements and your belittled form, you keep with the beat of the ever-pounding soundtrack. It could go from dark and ambient to upbeat and catchy. The game is in no way innovative or original, but is has some special unique charm to it. Maybe it's the industrial levels or the nonstop movement. Maybe if it asks if you love yourself, since you can either kill yourself to get ahead or spare a life for the last moment. What do you love?

author: {'steamid': '76561198009978959', 'num_games_owned': 3018, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 6318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2738, 'last_played': 1404077409}

author: {'steamid': '76561198054729082', 'num_games_owned': 2225, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1402481418}

author: {'steamid': '76561198044247712', 'num_games_owned': 371, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1520513393}
review: Przyjemna Retro platformówka, aczkolwiek bez polotu. Technicznie wszystko działa bez zarzutu. Rozgrywka jest wymagająca i uczciwa. Gra jest dobra zarówno dla hardkoro(poziom trudności Yolo, gdzie ma się jedno życie)-perfekcjonistów(tabela wyników, tryb speedrun,czy oceny) chcący ją wymaksować, jak i dla nowicjuszy(możliwość stawiania chekpointów bez ograniczenia, co odejmuje punkty). Jest ładna grafika. Bardzo dobra ścieżka dźwiekowa. Zróżnicowane poziomy, każdy jest inny graficznie, ma inne przeszkody, a do tego ma inny utwór. Minusem natiomiast jest długość rozgrywki (12 poziomów), która pozostawia niedosyt. Całość na standardowym poziomie trudności jest do ukończenia w w godzinke. Rozgrywki nie wydłużają zbytnio osiągnięcia i oceny. Co prawda poziomów jest tylko 12, ale kilkakrotne przechodzenie tych samych poziomów zbytnio się nie nudzi. Za tą cene(ja dałem 2 złote) fanom platformerów grę polecam. 6,5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996879432', 'num_games_owned': 5443, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 177, 'last_played': 1479939936}
review:
I really Love this game, as the name suggests. Had really good time playing and unlocking achievements. If you like games like Super Meat Boy, AVGN Game, Electronic SuperJoy etc. you will love this game. And for that price you cannot go wrong!

Edit: LOVE is Love, LOVE is Life

Edit: Looking back to this review and playing the game again after some time, I realize that this is not just a game for me, this is a symbol of something that will probably never be experienced in any game again. Some people might just look at this "game" as difficult indie platformer but for me, this is a form of Art. 

By this, I would like to thank you the developer for this life experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041010305', 'num_games_owned': 1599, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 367, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 367, 'last_played': 1393361600}
review: Love may at first be quite difficult for a lot of people but you'll quickly get a hang of it and try to get better and better at it. The desire of a faster completion time or to get that next achievement will get you restart again and again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105680429', 'num_games_owned': 5132, 'num_reviews': 572, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1561783805}
review: 游戏目的非常简单，就是跳跃躲避关卡陷阱，没有其他的目的了，这游戏可以说难也可以说不难，关键就是游戏成就了，游戏有多种模式，这些模式基本是用来刷成就的，游戏成就很难，基本都是给高手和变态玩的成就，作为一款挑战游戏只要你有耐心或者想打发时间的话那这款游戏很适合你，如果你真的把它当成休闲类游戏的话我也可以这么认为:D

author: {'steamid': '76561198040573839', 'num_games_owned': 2229, 'num_reviews': 298, 'playtime_forever': 89, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1400535142}
review: A short but challenging platformer. Somewhat reminiscent of VVVVVV without the gravity thing. Interesting and beautiful art too.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025350632', 'num_games_owned': 3421, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1400212597}
review:
Love is an excellent, difficult platformer that is not terribly frustrating or impossible. Infact, I find the difficulty of the game to be inspiring to do better and yet still feels great when you do succeed and beat the level that is in front of you. In Love there are 4 different modes: Easy Mode (infinite lives), Normal Mode (100 lives), YOLO Mode (1 Life), and a speedrun Mode (infinite lives and a timer). Aside from Easy Mode, each mode gives you something that makes you want to do better. You try to get through the game losing fewer and fewer lives, or seeing how far 1 life can get you, or how quickly you can beat the whole thing. I also liked how the game allows you to make your own checkpoints. There is no checkpoint to reach in the game, you can put one down in almost any place. I feel that this makes the game a lot less frustrating as you no longer have to repeat any actions that you have already done.

Overall, Love is a good game and I think that it is well worth the $3 regular price and is a must buy for any sale price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025853864', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1398355675}

author: {'steamid': '76561197997792412', 'num_games_owned': 1200, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1558730878}
review:
LOVE is a fun little platformer game with easy and tight controls. You have your movement keys, jump and the ability to set a respawn point - now get to the end. 

There are 12 levels in the main game + 10 extra ones that aren't in the main exe for some reason. It can be beaten easily in 30 minutes if you take your time and speedruns usually take 10 minutes. The fun I found in LOVE was the race to get a better score and speedrun it as fast as possible, coupled with some hidden achievements and Its a party. There's a one life only mode for the truly badass people out there - also fun to play with friends and see who can get the furthest.

For such a small game, I wouldn't expect the soundtrack to be so diverse but surprisingly Its quite listenable and I wouldn't mind having it in my library of game soundtracks. Calm, smooth and complimenting the 8bit art style.

Although unnecessary, I'd still love the see the ability to rebind keys and steam workshop support for custom levels would really be the icing on the cake. As it stands, you can get bored of the initial 12 levels pretty quickly.

If you're looking to try a simple obstacle course platformer, not too difficult but certainly not easy, give it a try. If you're looking for something hardcore, reminiscent of "I Wanna Be The Guy", maybe look elsewhere but try LOVE just the same - in YOLO mode, tell me how that works out for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021296673', 'num_games_owned': 1723, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 457, 'last_played': 1398441860}
review:
Jeu de plateforme rétro qui ne vous posera pas problème pendant très longtemps mais à de quoi vous occupez quelques heures et peut même vous proposez un peu de challenge (mode Yolo). Et puis en mode plus casu vous pouvez mettre des checkpoint partout où vous le désirez ce qui est très appréciable quand on veut s'entrainer à un endroit précis ou tout simplement la jouer prudent.

À noter aussi qu'il y a un classement steam et un mode spécial speedrun c'est un + qui est toujours le bienvenu surtout pour les jeux de plateformes.

+ Gameplay, court, pas cher, succès

- La musique (je l'ai supporté 10 minutes perso après j'ai préféré mettre ma playlist)

8.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198037930780', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1399449523}
review:
A short, simple platformer, where the main mechanic is that you get to set your own check-points.  With the press of a button, you set down a new check-point, and if you die, you respawn at the checkpoint you set.

At first this seems to be an easy way to essentially breeze through the game, but in later levels you have less and less areas to place your check-points that are safe, or possible at all.  For instance, a long sequence of bouncing on platforms gives you no opportunity to make the check-point you so desperately desire.

The system works really well, and leads to a pretty fun little game.

The level design is creative and interesting.  My favorite levels are feel like they could be a part of something larger.  There is a hint of a greater universe that is never shown to us, and isn't meant to be known.  

All of this, and if you're interested in speed-running, the game has a built in speed-runner mode.  The interplay between the check-point mechanic and speed-running works rather well, so this is a welcome addition, and should give you a good reason to replay.

All together, I would definitely recommend this game, especially considering the low price being asked for it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102998728', 'num_games_owned': 726, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1656864692}
review:
PC98とかであったなこんなの！
動きもあの頃のゲームまんまですわー　移動もジャンプも押した分だけキッチリ動く感じ！

全12面のシンプルなアクションゲーム。
自分で自由にリスポン地点を設定できるので、死にゲーではあるけど難易度はぬるめ。
アクションの難易度もマリオができれば十分クリアできる程度だと思います。(死ぬ直前からやり直しが可能という点も考慮に含めてですが）
残機の制限(とは言っても100機！)こそありますが、制限時間やリスポン地点設定回数の制限は無いので、1つ越えてはリスポン、１つ１つをじっくりと行けばいつかはきっと。

と、ゲーム自体のボリュームは控えめではありますが、この手のゲームは長いと苦行になっていくので価格と合わせてお手頃サイズかなぁと。
ステージを全部クリアしたら今度はタイムアタックやノーミス実績を回収に再度挑みましょう。
クリア時間だけでなく残り残機数やリスポン設置回数でスコア変わるし、Steam上でランキング集計されるのでちょっとムキになってもいいかもしれない。

お値段相応のボリュームではあるが、お値段以上に遊べるはず。買い。
